question_text: Did you observe the math class happening at the time of your visit?
display_text: Did you observe the math class happening at the time of your visit?
name in colloquial language: ଆପଣ ଗଣିତ କ୍ଲାସ୍ ଚାଲୁଥିବା ଦେଖିଲେ କି?

question_text: Is the teacher in the classroom trained on GKA methodology ?
display_text: How many responses indicate that the teacher in classroom is trained in GKA methodology?
name in colloquial language: କ୍ଲାସ ରେ ପଢ଼ାଉଥିବା ଶିକ୍ଷକ/ଶିକ୍ଷୟିତ୍ରୀ ଗଣିତ କଳିକା ଆନ୍ଦୋଳନର(GKA) ପ୍ରଶିକ୍ଷଣ ପ୍ରାପ୍ତ କରି ଥିଲେ କି?

question_text: Did you see the Ganitha Kalika Andolana TLM being used at the time of your visit?
display_text: Did you see the Ganitha Kalika Andolana TLM being used at the time of your visit?
name in colloquial language: ଆପଣ କ୍ଲାସ୍ ରେ ଗଣିତ କଳିକା ଆନ୍ଦୋଳନର(GKA) ଶିକ୍ଷଣ ସାମଗ୍ରୀ(TLM) ବ୍ୟବହୃତ ହେବାର ଦେଖିଲେ କି?

question_text: Did you observe the Representational Stage practised in the classroom ?
